summary: ROTC-trained leader with experience in customer advocacy, finance processes, and retail operations; developed skills in initiative, teamwork, and problem solving; proven ability to handle challenging situations and ensure accuracy and compliance in loan processing and customer service.

experience.title: Customer Advocate
experience.description: Processed loan applications and disbursements; verified documents; presented loan and repayment schedules; calculated interest, principal, and closing costs; maintained loan records; received checks and cash; ensured compliance and accuracy; created summary reports and maintained a clean, welcoming environment.

experience.title: Sales Associate
experience.description: Greeted customers, identified needs, described merchandise, explained operation and care, helped locate items, processed sales, maintained records, and contributed to store promotions and customer service.

experience.title: Sales Associate
experience.description: Greeted customers, assisted with merchandise selection, processed payments, returns, and exchanges; maintained checkout areas; stocked shelves and assisted with store operations.

experience.title: Food Service / Cashier
experience.description: Maintained sanitation and safety standards; prepared food items; took orders and received payments; stocked and cleaned; ensured quality and proper procedures; provided customer service in a fast-paced setting.
